config.label: URL Image
config.name: src
config.helpText: Image URL. It can be an internal or external route

config.label: Alternative Text
config.name: alt
config.helpText: Alternative text of the image to be displayed when the image cannot be loaded

config.label: Long Descrition
config.name: longdesc
config.helpText: Long description of the image if the alternative text cannot accommodate this text because it is very long

config.label: Link
config.name: href
config.helpText: Link to redirect if we click on the image

config.label: Link Target
config.name: target
config.helpText: Link opening mode. It can be _blank, _self, _parent, _top

config.label: Responsive SRC
config.name: responsiveSRC
config.helpText: URL of the image to display for mobile devices. If you leave it blank, the same image will be displayed for any type of screen.
